page.title: 02Stanton St Quintin Village
page.content: There are a couple of very large houses, one of them is{the Manor.}It has 24 rooms and has a lot of land surrounding it (about 4 acres). In that land is a swimming pool, quite a few garages and lots of woodland. The only disadvantage is that it has no heating. Next door to the Manor is{the {Court.}It too has lots of land (about 6 acres). About 1967 it was split up into 4 different parts. The main part has recently been modernised and sold for Â£150,000. Both buildings are close to{the Church.}About 150 metres away is Bouverie Park. There are 17 houses in{Bouverie Park,}even though it goes up to 18. The reason for that is that the builder forgot number 13. Each house is worth about Â£72,000.
